notesStmt.note: Good condition. One mistake crossed through with black.
Begins (f. 1r): śrīgaṇeśāya namaḥ dhanadākavaca devy uvācakathayasva mahādeva dhanadākavacaṁ śubhaṁ yad dhṛtvā yāti durge pi kubera iva bhairava 1 vetāḷabhaira uvāca
Ends (f. 1v): aputro labhate putraṁ sarvavidyāṁ suśobhanāṁ 13
Colophon (f. 1v): iti śrīdhanadākavacaṁ samāptaṁ śubhaṁ bhavatu rāmadūtāya namo namaḥ
